alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 4:52AM CST until January 17 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging from 0.5-1 inch in lower elevations to 2-4 inches along ridgetops. A few locations in the higher terrain could receive between 4-6 inches of snow. * WHERE...In Alabama, Jackson and DeKalb counties. In Tennessee, Lincoln, Moore, and Franklin counties. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult at times, beginning late this morning. Subfreezing temperatures on Monday morning will result in slick and hazardous road conditions for morning commuters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of heavy snow and gusty winds may lead to tree and power line damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
